short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Admire Kurapika's resolve beneath a tranquil sky, with quick shortcuts for easy access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of Hunter x Hunter with the cool and determined Kurapika in this striking live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by Kurapika’s calm yet intense demeanor, featuring rich gold, red, and black tones that highlight his determination and noble spirit.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that matches Kurapika’s focused and strategic mindset.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in Hunter x Hunter-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as precise and tactical as Kurapika’s Nen abilities.
